jei.friender_pearl.desc: Used to tame Friendermen. Randomly dropped by Evolved Enderman.
jei.skull_enderman.desc: Dropped by Enderman. When worn will prevent Enderman attacks.
jei.skull_evolved_enderman.desc: Dropped by Evolved Enderman. When worn will prevent Enderman attacks.
jei.skull_frienderman.desc: Dropped by Frienderman. When worn will prevent Enderman Attacks. Also greatly improves odds of taming a Frienderman with a Friender Pearl.
